Description:
Detects disabling security tools

Author: Ömer Günal, Alejandro Ortuno, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Disabling Security Tools - Builtin
Query: sourcetype="linux-syslog" ("stopping iptables" OR "stopping ip6tables" OR "stopping firewalld" OR "stopping cbdaemon" OR "stopping falcon-sensor")
